title: Factor pairs of the first term
speech: The factors for  6 p squared,  are 3p,2p, or  6 p ,  1 p

title: Factor pairs for the third term
text: Find the factors if the last rem. Consider the signs. The coefficient of the middle term is negative, so we use the negative factors. The factors of $$10$$ are $$-10$$, $$-1$$ or $$-2$$, $$-5$$

title: Trial and Error
text: Test all the combinations of the factors until the correct product is found
